histogram.name: PrivacyBudget.Identifiability.FinchConfigValidationResult
histogram.summary: Indicates whether the Finch configuration for the privacy budget identifiability study was validated successfully.

histogram.name: PrivacyBudget.Identifiability.RecordedSample
histogram.summary: Indicates whether a sample collected in the renderer was accepted or dropped by the AggregatingSampleCollector.
